response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer at a price that reflects its true worth and benefits to you. We propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the maximum value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information.", "product_price": 1350000}
